author: stefan2
msg: On the fsfs-format7 branch: Adapt transaction code to latest API changes and
make transactions create the log<->phys indexes.
* subversion/libsvn_fs_fs/transaction.c
(store_l2p_index_entry,
store_p2l_index_entry): new utility functions write index records
(allocate_item_index): new utility function to allocate an item index
(rep_write_get_baton): s/base_offset/base_item_index
(rep_write_contents_close,
write_hash_rep,
write_hash_delta_rep): store item indexes instead of offsets;
update proto indexes
(write_final_rev): drop item_index parameter as it gets allocated
dynamically; adapt to API / signature changes; disable issue #3845
code for format7 repos for the time being; explicitly store root
noderev item in l2p index; add noderevs to p2l index
(write_final_changed_path_info): add entry for changes list to indexes
(commit_body): adapt to API / signature changes; create final indexes
